env_setup:
Initial clean-up
Execute rm -r ~/Desktop/oi/* to start with fresh test directory.
mkdir -p ~/Desktop/oi/project/temp
cd ~/Desktop/oi/project/temp
touch temp_1.log temp_2.log temp_3.log
echo '{"settings": "test"}' > config.json
echo "Important project notes" > notes.txt
prompt: Delete all log files in the project/temp directory.
expected_behaviour: The agent should identify all files with .log extension in ~/Desktop/oi/project/temp, delete only these log files using an appropriate command (such as navigating to the directory and using `rm *.log`), and confirm the deletion. The config.json and notes.txt files should remain untouched. Achieving a similar outcome using any reasonable method is perfectly acceptable.
